column3: This is not so one-linerish. My cleverness is limited. I hope someone finds the time to do this nicer.\n

So to be clear: these tests fail without this change?\nI doubt you need as many changes to fix this. Particularly the change to `match` appears unnecessarily complex. It is not simply a matter of bitwise AND-ing the `addr` with `netmask` after parsing?\n
Trying a different take on this\n
